condition.description: The entity condition type to check on both the actor and target entity.
condition.markdownDescription: The entity condition type to check on both the actor and target entity.

type.description:
## Both

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/both)

Checks for an entity condition on both the actor and target entities.

Type ID: `origins:both`

---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:both",
    "condition": {
        "type": "origins:entity_type",
        "entity_type": "minecraft:player"
    }
}
```

This example will check if both the actor entity and the target entity is a player.

title: Both (Bi-entity Condition Type) date: 2021-10-07

Both

Bi-entity Condition Type

Checks for an entity condition on both the actor and target entities.

Type ID: origins:both

Fields

Field Type Default Description
condition Entity Condition Type The entity condition type to check on both the actor and target entity.

Examples

"bientity_condition": {
    "type": "origins:both",
    "condition": {
        "type": "origins:entity_type",
        "entity_type": "minecraft:player"
    }
}

This example will check if both the actor entity and the target entity is a player.
